units.name: rancher.service
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Rancher Admin Container
After=docker.service
Requires=docker.service

[Service]
TimeoutStartSec=0
Restart=always
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker kill %n
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker rm %n
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker pull rancher/rancher:stable
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run --rm --name %n -p 8080:80 -p 8443:443 -v /opt/mediadepot/rancher:/var/lib/rancher rancher/rancher:stable
ExecStop=/usr/bin/docker stop -t 15 %n


[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
